snippet: Michael McPhail was sentenced in Norfolk on Tuesday to three years in prison for conspiracy to bribe public officials at the United States Navy Military Sealift Command
abstract: Former government contractor Michael McPhail is sentenced to three years in prison for conspiracy to bribe public officials at United States Navy Military Sealift Command.
lead_paragraph: Michael McPhail was sentenced in Norfolk on Tuesday to three years in prison for conspiracy to bribe public officials at the United States Navy Military Sealift Command

headline.main: Virginia: Ex-Government Contractor Gets Three Years in Bribe Scheme
